title: Sales forecast for eye care product Restasis in U.S. 2014 to 2025
summary: Overall Sales in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Sales in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2022.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Sales in million U.S. dollars, about 2242.0 was reported at Year 2022
The lowest Sales in million U.S. dollars, of value 1524.0 was reported at Year 2017
